mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pwd, name, email, birth, sns) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{sns})
mapper.select: select id, pwd, name, email, birth, sns, regDate from member where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set pwd = #{pwd}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, sns = #{sns}, regDate = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, pwd, name, email, birth, sns, regDate from member
